entry.title: [LIM1C/RBX2A-B-D/SBG1A/WAW1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Equipment maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 1, 09:30 - 14:30 UTC

Sep 18, 20:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 01/10/2024 09:30 UTC
End time : 01/10/2024 14:30 UTC
Service impact : Some servers will be unavailable for 3 hours during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][HostedPrivateCloud] - VMware vCenter Server + Hosts upgrade
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 30, 07:00 UTC  -  Oct 4, 15:00 UTC

Sep 17, 17:33 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

entry.title: [ERI][Hosted Private Cloud] - Incident notification
entry.content:
Sep 18, 12:04 UTC
Resolved - On September 16th 2024 at 11:20 UTC, emergency services have proceeded to evacuate the whole industrial zone where our Erith datacenter is located. The evacuation was ordered due to safety concerns related to a nearby building inside which a fire occurred.
At 11:30 today UTC, local authorities have permitted to gain access to our datacenter. Risks have completely been eliminated in the area and return to business as usual is in progress. We are happy to share our teams are now back in the datacenter marking the end of this event.
As from the beginning of this incident, teams have been fully committed to make sure there is no impact to services delivered to our customers. Throughout all the event all services were and are operating normally.
We take this opportunity to thank local authorities, police, fire brigades, and all respondents, for their ongoing efforts in ensuring everyone' safety.
We thank our customers for their patience and remain at their disposal in case they have any question

Start Time : 16/09/2024 11:20 UTC
End Time : 18/09/2024 11:30 UTC

Sep 16, 13:39 UTC
Investigating - Our ERI Datacenter have been evacuated based on suspicions of explosive risks related to the nearby plant oil refinery.
There is no direct impact to services delivered to our clients. However scheduled maintenance are being delayed.
More information is present by clicking on this link.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Rack R832B18
entry.content:
Sep 18, 10:03 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 18/09/2024 09:13 UTC
End time : 18/09/2024 09:15 UTC
Root cause : Electrical issue
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Sep 18, 09:56 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

We are actively working to resolve this problem.

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Here is detail for this incident :

Start time : 18/09/2024 09:13 UTC
Service impact : A significant number of servers and host in the rack R832B18 are no longer responding.
Root cause : ELectrical issue
Ongoing actions : Our teamsis working to fix the issue.
Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
